The age at which symptoms begin to develop varies widely among affected individuals, but the average age is 16. This form is typically associated with a normal life expectancy.",GHR,galactosialidosis
How many people are affected by galactosialidosis ?,The prevalence of galactosialidosis is unknown; more than 100 cases have been reported. Ap
